notes: Beautifully renovated apartment with a minimalist industrial-chic aesthetic featuring clean white walls, modern light wood flooring, stylish pendant lighting, open wardrobe shelving, a Hitachi fridge, and Heran microwave. The space is very clean with good natural light from large windows; the flat layout with no visible stairs is baby-friendly, though the open metal wardrobe frames and low-profile furniture with sharp edges would need baby-proofing.
